name: Agility Dogs
summary:
He’s your best friend. He waited all day for you to get back from work. Now, all he wants is to have some fun… he just happens to be made out of clay.
Take your dog through a fun and exciting run through 5 different agility parks. Run, walk, jump, climb obstacles before time runs out. Collect doggie snacks and steaks.
Agility Dogs is a unique and exciting endless runner entirely made out of hand-made clay models. It simulates physics, depth, and perspective to add to the fun! It also includes “Puppy Mode”, which is a game mode designed for younger kids.
